_description: Rainy Night Theme - Dark, moody visual styling with glass effects and warm accent colors
name: Rainy Night

background._purpose: Input bar transparency and glass blur effect
background._colorNote: Controls input bar transparency. Change 0.85 to 0.9 = less see-through, 0.7 = more see-through. Safe range: 0.1-1.0
background._blurNote: Glass blur effect behind input bar. Change 20px to 30px = more blur, 10px = less blur. Range: 5px-50px

border._purpose: Input bar border styling with gradient glow
border._borderNote: Gradient creates subtle glowing border effect. Change 0.3 to 0.5 = brighter glow

shadow._purpose: Input bar depth and lighting effects
shadow._shadowNote: Outer shadow for depth, inner shadow for subtle bottom highlight. Change 0.4 to 0.6 = darker shadow

filePreviewZone._backgroundNote: Subtle highlight to distinguish file area. Change 0.1 to 0.15 = more prominent file zone

filePreview._fileNote: Dark background makes file previews stand out. Change 0.3 to 0.4 = darker file cards

removeButton._removeNote: Red X button. Change 0.8 to 0.6 = more transparent, 1.0 = always solid red

typography._textColorNote: Warm off-white text color. Change #DFD0B8 to #FFFFFF = pure white, #E0C9A6 = warmer tone
typography._placeholderNote: Placeholder text transparency. Change 0.6 to 0.8 = more visible placeholder
typography._selectedNote: Full opacity for selected dropdown items

textHandler._comment: BRICK-302 TextHandler styling - auto-resize textarea component
textHandler._purpose: Styling for standalone text handling component with smart auto-resize

textarea._colorNote: Text color matching theme. Change #DFD0B8 to #FFFFFF = pure white text
textarea._fontSizeNote: Text size. Change 14px to 16px = larger text, 12px = smaller text
textarea._fontFamilyNote: Font stack. Change system-ui to monospace = code-style font
textarea._lineHeightNote: Line spacing. MUST match config lineHeight. Change 20px to 24px = more space between lines
textarea._placeholderNote: Placeholder text transparency. Change 0.6 to 0.8 = more visible placeholder
textarea._transitionNote: Smooth height animation. Change 0.2s to 0.1s = faster, 0.3s = slower
textarea._backgroundNote: Textarea background. Change transparent to rgba(0,0,0,0.1) = subtle background
textarea._borderNote: Border styling. Change none to 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1) = subtle border
textarea._outlineNote: Focus outline. Keep none for clean appearance
textarea._resizeNote: Manual resize handle. Keep none - auto-resize handles sizing
textarea._overflowNote: Vertical scrolling. Auto-managed by component logic
textarea._boxSizingNote: CSS box model. Keep border-box for predictable sizing

icon._iconNote: Plus icon color. Change 0.7 to 1.0 = fully visible icon

plusButton._hoverNote: Hover highlight. Change 0.1 to 0.2 = brighter hover effect

chevron._chevronNote: Arrow color. Change 0.5 to 0.8 = more visible arrows

statusIndicator._statusNote: Bright green with glow. Change #00ff00 to #22ff22 = softer green

menu._menuNote: Darker than input bar for hierarchy. Change 0.9 to 0.95 = less transparent dropdown

item._itemNote: Text becomes fully opaque when selected. Change 0.15 to 0.2 = brighter selection

sectionHeader._headerNote: Section headers are brighter than items. Change 0.9 to 1.0 = pure white headers

interactiveStates._comment: Interactive element styling for hover, selected states
interactiveStates._purpose: Consistent styling for buttons, dropdowns, and interactive elements
interactiveStates._hoverNote: Standard hover background for all interactive elements
interactiveStates._selectedNote: Background for selected dropdown items - slightly brighter than hover
interactiveStates._removeNote: File remove button hover state - solid red for clear action feedback

stencils._comment: Horizontal lines extending from input bar
stencils._purpose: Visual extension lines that frame the input bar

gradient._gradientNote: Fades from screen edges toward input bar. Change 0.5 to 0.7 = brighter connection to input bar

link._linkNote: Blue accent color for navigation links. Change #007acc to #0099ff = brighter blue

tagline._taglineNote: Muted text for supplementary info. Change 0.7 to 0.9 = more prominent tagline

globalBody._bodyNote: Dark page background. Change #222831 to #1a1a1a = darker, #2a3440 = lighter

spacing._comment: Standardized spacing scale used throughout app
spacing._spacingNote: Use these instead of arbitrary px values for consistent spacing

container._sizeNote: All icon buttons use this size for consistency

svg._svgNote: All SVG icons inside buttons use this size

colors._colorNote: Consistent with existing interactive element colors

scrollback._comment: Message scrollback container and message styling

messageContent.fontFamily: 'Lexend', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'SF Pro Text', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif

roleLabel._labelNote: Small caps style for speaker identification

roleColors._colorsNote: Speaker identification colors - Boss in red, Samara in orange

actionIcons._iconsNote: Floating action button group on hover

container._heightNote: Full viewport height for main app container

transitions._transitionNote: Quick for icons, default for larger elements

backdrop._blurNote: Lighter than inputBar blur (20px) for subtle glass effect

fontFamily.content: 'Lexend', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'SF Pro Text', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif
fontFamily._fontNote: System for UI elements, Lexend for readable content
